input_text.Prompt:
Product name:
Wayne SWS50-12P 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump Conventional 12 gallon Tank System

Product keywords:
1/2 hp cast iron shallow well jet pump conventional tank system with 12 gallon horizontal tank
1/2 hp; max. Flow rate is 420 gallons per hour; (50 psi)
3/4 in. Npt discharge with 1-1/4 in. Suction
Dual voltage (120V/240V) high efficiency square flange motor (factory set for 240V)
Pressure switch is pre-set at 30-50 psi for automatic operation
Assembled in US with foreign and domestic parts
Durable cast iron volute with dedicated priming port for volute filling. For wells 0 ft. - 25 ft. in depth.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Wayne SWS50-12P 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump Conventional 12 gallon Tank System is a 1/2 horsepower cast iron shallow well jet pump conventional tank system with a 12 gallon horizontal tank.  This pump has a max. Flow rate of 420 gallons per hour and has a 3/4 inch NPT discharge with a 1-1/4 inch suction.  The dual voltage (120V/240V) high efficiency square flange motor is factory set for 240V.  This pump's pressure switch is pre-set at 30-50 psi for automatic operation.  This pump is assembled in the US with foreign and domestic parts.  This durable cast iron pump has a volute with a dedicated priming port for volute filling.  This pump can be used for wells 0 ft. - 25 ft. in depth.
input_text.Response B: Wayne SWS50-12P 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump Conventional 12 gallon Tank System is durable! 1/2 HP cast iron shallow well jet pump conventional tank system (includes SWS50) that is assembled in the US with foreign and domestic parts. 3/4 in. NPT discharge with 1 1/4 in. suction. Dual voltage (120V/240V) high efficiency square flange motor (factory set for 240V). Max flow rate is 420 GPH at 0 ft. (50 PSI). Pressure switch is pre-set at 30-50 PSI for automatic operation. Durable cast iron volute with dedicated priming port for volute filling. For wells 0 ft. - 25 ft. in depth.
